10.other: This is a 'dry-run'. Please review the logs of all actions that will be performed, and if it's ok for you press 'Run real import now'

12.other: Old meta.serial plugin was removed and split into metastore.serial and meta.user

15.other: Are you sure that you want to perform the upgrade?

16.other: Following packages are available for upgrade

18.other: No necessary upgrade detected: click to perform a new check.

19.other: Click to check for new upgrade

3.other: Click on the button to start upgrading. Please make sure that the software folder is installed before starting. If you have a 'Linux Package' warning, it means that update cannot be performed in-app but that you must use your server yum/apt-get command.

8.other: Enter full path (from server root) to the previous location, then run the simulation
